sentence:
Ms. BALDWIN. Mr. President, I rise to recognize the 50th anniversary  of Wisconsin Regional Training Partnership, WRTP, Building Industry  Group Skilled Trade Employment Program's, BIG STEP. I am delighted to  celebrate this impactful organization's 50 years of service to the  State of Wisconsin.

Founded in 1975,…
